DOC.brief_summary: This study seek develop test Web-based tobacco relapse prevention program target postpartum woman quit smoking pregnancy . Participants randomly assign one two condition : ( 1 ) Enhanced Web+phone Condition receive access interactive Web-based intervention plus 3 brief supportive phone call personal coach ; ( 2 ) A Basic Web Information-Only Control Condition receive access informational website plus introductory phone call . The hypothesis Women Enhanced Condition successful avoid tobacco relapse woman assign Basic Control Condition .
DOC.brief_title: Web Phone Intervention Maintain Postpartum Tobacco Abstinence
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim project : 1 . Adapt refine Enhanced Web+phone intervention maintenance tobacco abstinence postpartum . 2 . Evaluate feasibility acceptability Enhanced Web+phone tobacco abstinence maintenance program postpartum woman . Aim 2.1 The investigator hypothesize intervention feasible assessed woman 's report helpfulness , relevance program usability . Aim 2.2 The investigator hypothesize intervention acceptable postpartum woman measure engagement use program . 3 . Estimate initial efficacy Enhanced Web+phone intervention tobacco abstinence 3 6 month postpartum relative Basic Web Information-Only control . Aim 3.1 The investigator hypothesize , relative Basic Web Information-Only control , Enhanced Web+phone intervention associate 10-points great prolonged abstinence rate 3 6 month postpartum . Aim 3.2 The investigator hypothesize , relative Basic Web control , tobacco use outcomes 3 6 month postpartum Enhanced Web+phone intervention associate great improvement ( > .35 ) putative mediator prolong abstinence ( i.e. , self-efficacy , intention maintain nonsmoking , mood perceive stress , weight concern ) . Secondary aim proposal : Evaluate potential predictor postpartum smoke relapse . The investigator examine pre-pregnancy smoking rate , partner 's tobacco use demographic factor predictor postpartum tobacco relapse . Similarly , investigator examine role mood , perceive stress weight concern predictor prolong abstinence among woman group . For example , may woman high baseline level depressive symptom perceive stress may likely return smoke postpartum , regardless condition .
DOC.criteria: Smoked least 5 cigarettes/day least 1 3 month prior become pregnant No smoking week 34 38 pregnancy Able read English At least 18 year age Use Web email account least per week Completed informed assent/consent .
